import { useState } from "react" import React from 'react' export default function About() { const[myStyle,setMyStyle]=useState({ color:"black", backgroundColor:"White" }) useS const toggleMode=()=>{ if(myStyle.color==="black"){ setMyStyle({ color: "white", backgroundColor: "black" }) } else{ setMyStyle({ color: "black", backgroundColor: "white" }) } } return (

Some placeholder content for the first accordion panel. This panel is shown by default, thanks to the .show class.

Some placeholder content for the second accordion panel. This panel is hidden by default.

And lastly, the placeholder content for the third and final accordion panel. This panel is hidden by default.
) }
